org.hps.monitoring.ecal.plots

Class EcalEventDisplayWithRawWaveform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.monitoring.ecal.plots.EcalEventDisplayWithRawWaveform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener, CrystalListener

    public class EcalEventDisplayWithRawWaveform
extends Driver
implements CrystalListener, ActionListener
    Driver EcalEventDisplay generates the histograms shown to the user in the fifth tab of the monitoring application. An instance of the single event display is employed to allow for the selection of specific crystal channels.

    The implementation is as follows:
    • The event display is opened in a separate window
    • It is updated regularly, according to the event refresh rate
    • If the user clicks on a crystal, the corresponding energy and time distributions (both of type IHistogram1D) are shown in the last panel of the monitoring application, as well as a 2D histogram (hit time vs. hit energy). Finally, if available, the raw waveshape (in mV) is displayed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver

        Parameters:
